pokerapp

Class HandFactory

  • Object
    • HandFactory

  • public class HandFactory
extends Object
    Instantiates valid passed cards and creates hand instances from them. Can also create hands from text descriptions of cards
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    steve

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HandFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hand create(String... cards)
      Takes a variable number of cards and returns them in a hand
      private Card createCard(String card)
      When passed an abbreviated (in accordance with pokerapp's conventions) card name, returns a corresponding Card instance
      Hand createFromLine(String line)
      When passed a string representing a hand, will return a hand comprising the represented cards

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public Hand create(String... cards)
            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Takes a variable number of cards and returns them in a hand
        Parameters:
        cards -
        Returns:
        hand of cards
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - passing up from createCard

      • createFromLine

        public Hand createFromLine(String line)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException
        When passed a string representing a hand, will return a hand comprising the represented cards
        Parameters:
        line - a string representing a hand e.g. "S4 D5 H6 C7 S8" - a straight
        Returns:
        a hand of cards recognisable by the application "S4", "D5", "H6", "C7", "S8"
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - passing up from createCard

      • createCard

        private Card createCard(String card)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        When passed an abbreviated (in accordance with pokerapp's conventions) card name, returns a corresponding Card instance
        Parameters:
        card - string representation of card used by pokerapp eg: "H4" for 4 of Hearts
        Returns:
        a Card instantiated with the values in the abbreviation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when receiving an illegal card name
